The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 December is 1,490,720 (2,648.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 December, there were 83,678 new confirmed cases (148.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 November, there were 94,818 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (11,140 fewer cases).
